Room.Name: Gypsy Camp
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a gypsy camp located in a broad clearing in a grove of trees.
Room.LongDescription: A large campfire burns brightly in the center of the camp, and a group of dancers swirl to the music from a wild violin played by a tall youth wearing bright clothing. A brown bear in a harness shuffles with them, waving his giant paws in time to the music. The good smells from the cooking pots are making you hungry. Several large wagons are pulled into a circle around the clearing to the north, while there appears to be an animal keep to the west. Easterly is a smooth, worn path leading away from the camp.
